entry.value: Metanode to create input data for interactive Volcano plot using Volcano plot application in Python. Volcano plot application needs to be located e.g. in KNIME workspace, please check the path in the metanode settings (default is "Applications/Volcano_plot/" folder inside your KNIME workspace).%%00010%%00010You have to provide data columns for p-value and log fold change. Rows with missing values are removed in these columns. In Case of p-value=0, there is imputed the minimal value in the given dataset or it is possible specify the replacement value in the application.%%00010%%00010You can also specify other columns for annotations.%%00010%%00010Dataset is exported by the metanode into the Volcano plot application ("data/knime_data" subfolder). The metanode then starts the simple python webserver inside the Volcano plot application folder and opens browser with the interactive Volcano plot aplicaton. %%00010%%00010The metanode will be shown as still running to indicate that the webserver is running from that concrete metanode. You can cancel the metanode or close the workflow with the running metanode to stop the webserver.%%00010%%00010The application contains formaular for setting input data of appliacation, Volcano plot, summary table, table of selected proteins from graph and table with dataset, which could be filtered. The graph shows the filtered data in the last table.%%00010%%00010

Metanode to create input data for interactive Volcano plot using Volcano plot application in Python. Volcano plot application needs to be located e.g. in KNIME workspace, please check the path in the metanode settings (default is "Applications/Volcano_plot/" folder inside your KNIME workspace).%%00010%%00010You have to provide data columns for p-value and log fold change. Rows with missing values are removed in these columns. In Case of p-value=0, there is imputed the minimal value in the given dataset or it is possible specify the replacement value in the application.%%00010%%00010You can also specify other columns for annotations.%%00010%%00010Dataset is exported by the metanode into the Volcano plot application ("data/knime_data" subfolder). The metanode then starts the simple python webserver inside the Volcano plot application folder and opens browser with the interactive Volcano plot aplicaton. %%00010%%00010The metanode will be shown as still running to indicate that the webserver is running from that concrete metanode. You can cancel the metanode or close the workflow with the running metanode to stop the webserver.%%00010%%00010The application contains formular for setting input data of appliacation, Volcano plot, summary table, table of selected proteins from graph and table with dataset, which could be filtered. The graph shows the filtered data in the last table.
